layout.title: Material UI Kit - Complete set of Material UI Components for Figma

heading.primary_title: Complete set of Material UI Elements
heading.secondary_title: Design faster, code easier. Prototype quickly and turn mock-ups into a fully functional app with a complex set of Material UI Elements.

look-inside.heading: Look inside
look-inside.guidelines_content: First, get tips on components, theme and design system. â€¨There you will find elements that will speed up the work associated with creating a theme.
look-inside.components_content: Material UI Kit has over 3,600 components (simple, complex and group), 2,400 icons and 80 local styles that you can customize to your needs. You can change the color palette with one click.
look-inside.frames_content: You will find many different variants and possibilities of using the components that make up the Material UI Kit. You can freely use examples in your project.
look-inside.screens_content: Are you looking for inspiration? See how you can use our set of UI components in specific layouts consistent with the Material Design style.
